C_Cpp.clang_format_style: { BasedOnStyle: Google, IndentWidth: 4, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: false, ColumnLimit: 0, BraceWrapping: { AfterClass: false, AfterControlStatement: false, AfterEnum: false, AfterFunction: false, AfterNamespace: false, AfterStruct: false, BeforeCatch: false, BeforeElse: false, IndentBraces: false } }
